column2: "Signo Guns are just so quick. Never mind Just Attacks, I'm struggling to even aim at them."
"And they're armed with guns, so my Bullet Bow's range advantage goes completely out of the window."
"Landing a Just Attack on one of those guys will be a great way to show off how much my skills have improved..."
"...But I'm still not experienced enough to pull it off. Senpai, could you show me how to do it?"
